resources.string: Battery level, last charging time, estimated remaining time
RSSI, last connection and disconnection time

Mi Bandage requires the installation of the Mi Fit app on the same phone. At first you have to pair %1$s in Mi Fit app, then you can use Mi Bandage. If you want to use Mi Fit application, choose this.

Mi Fit app is not required for the Mi Bandage to work. After the pairing, uninstall the Mi Fit app or unpair your device. When restoring the Mi Fit cooperation, you will need to re-pair your %1$s in the Mi Fit application.
An authentication key must be provided for standalone mode

• Unpair %1$s in the official Mi Fit app
  • Uninstall the official Mi Fit app
  • Download and install the modified Mi Fit app
  • Pair the %1$s in the modified Mi Fit app (do not unpair)
  • Uninstall the modified Mi Fit app
Authentication key can be found at: internal storage/freemyband/mac address.txt
전화 수신 중 시계가 진동할 것입니다
밴드 전원이 켜진 상태에서 화면을 위로 당겨 잠금 해제
Not recognisable characters conversion, turn off if the Band supports your language or you have installed custom font firmware
Text length, depends on the font used (for example Chinese or Cyrillic characters)

If your Band shows the incoming caller name currently, then you do not need to do the following steps just turn off Incoming call alerts on Mi Fit.

If you do not use Incoming call alerts and the phone language is not English:
1. Set your phone language to English.
2. Open Mi Fit app, wait until the font firmware update done. If firmware update doesn\'t start, try reboot your phone.
3. Open the Profile/Mi Band/Incoming call menu.
4. Turn on: Turn on incoming call alerts.
5. Turn on: Show contact information.
6. Check if you can Band shows caller name by calling your phone.
7. Turn off : Turn on incoming call alerts (Show contact information stays on).
8. Set phone language back to your language.
%1$s and phone connection signals and settings
Immediate signal when notification is received
Signal only when the screen is off
\'app\' icon (if app there is no in predefined and neither custom notification group)
Signal (click on the icon to change it) before the actual notification in order to have more time to look at the display
%1$s and phone disconnection signals and settings
%1$s and phone disconnection signals, it does not signal when the bluetooth is turned off manually
활성화 (do not forget to turn off incoming call alerts on Mi Fit app)
Incoming internet call signal, display caller ID
Messenger, WhatsApp, Viber, Duo, Hangouts, Line, Telegram, Zalo
Missed internet call signal, display caller ID
Skype, Messenger, WhatsApp, Viber, Duo, Hangouts, Line, Telegram, Zalo
If more than one app also uses the icon to differentiate notifications from each other
State of controllers in do not disturb mode
Controlled by the phone\'s do not disturb mode, it has a higher priority than the scheduled do not disturb mode
At the end of the do not disturb mode, turn on all bandages or restore states as those were at the time of start
At the end restore bandages\' state
At the end turn on all bandages
Activate %1$s DnD mode (disable calls, messages and lift wrist to view info)
At the start of the DnD mode turn Bluetooth off, at the end turn Bluetooth on
블루투스를 활성화하고 밴드 기기를 폰에 가까이 가져와 주세요
밴드 찾는 중 (1분이 소요될 수 있습니다) …
밴드를 찾지 못한 경우, Mi 피트/Play/Discoverable을 활성화하거나 폰 블루투스 설정에서 페어링하세요
Up to %1$,d groups can be used in normal mode
Up to 3 values can be set in normal mode
Press one of the red buttons to record pattern
Record the pattern using the %1$s touch button
Record the pattern using the %1$s music screen
Record the pattern using the %1$s pulse screen
The specified pattern is similar to a sample of another function, record another
You can not use more than %1$,d functions in normal mode
Select applications with the lower right \'+\' button on the card
Up to 2 alarm can be used in normal mode
Smaller repeat interval can be set only in premium mode
This feature is only available in premium mode
A new message is received, view it on the phone.

지원되는 기기:
- 샤오미 미밴드 4
- 샤오미 미밴드 3
- 샤오미 미밴드 2
- 샤오미 미밴드 HRX
- Huami Amazfit Bip
- Huami Amazfit Bip Lite
- Huami Amazfit Band 2 (A1713)
- Huami Amazfit Cor (MiDong)
- Huami Amazfit Arc (A1603)

If you use more applications to control Band, they interfere with each other so temporarily turn off those.

If Band is not found, then you can set the MAC address manually when you discover (MAC address is found: Mi Fit/Profil/Band).

If you have a connection problem:
- Check the 설정/진단 settings
- Recent apps screen: lock the Mi Bandage (pull down the app and click on lock icon).
- Phone/battery optimization: set Mi Bandage app to not optimized.
- Phone/apps: clear Bluetooth Share and other \'Bluetooth\' apps data.
설정/개발자 옵션:
- Don\'t keep activities: disable
- Background process limit: standard limit
- Memory optimization: middle/low/disable

If Band is not found or if you are having trouble syncing Mi Fit app, then install the BToolkit, nRF Connect or similar Bluetooth manager app and remove any pairing, bonded device.

If you have problem (discover Band, not have notification signal), please try it:
1. If you installed the Greenify (or other hibernating app) turn it off.
2. Install Mi Bandage app.
3. Restart phone.
4. Turn off, on Bluetooth.
5. Open Mi Fit app, wait until the synchronization done, close it.
6. Open Mi Bandage app, click discover button.
Disable notifications (do not show the application notifications)
Immediate signal when notification is received
Signal only when the screen is off
If you use the %1$s/Notifications/Clear all function
If you remove the notification from the phone\'s notification drawer
Signal only when the title or content of the notification (case insensitive)
알파벳이나 숫자가 아닌 문자들은 특별한 의미를 가지고 있으므로, 정규표현식을 알지 못하는 경우, 작동시키지 마세요
Are you sure you want to discard the changes?

Notification content: In publishing and graphic design, lorem ipsum is a filler text or greeking commonly used to demonstrate the textual elements of a graphic document or visual presentation. \nReplacing meaningful content with placeholder text allows designers to design the form of the content before the content itself has been produced.
icon: choose this icon to show the notifications title/content.

미리 정의된 앱 신호는 메시지가 아닌 아이콘만 보여줄 것입니다.

Mi 피트 앱에서 앱 알림을 비활성화해야 합니다.

당신이 생성한 알림 그룹이 미리 정의된 것보다 더 높은 우선순위를 갖습니다.

icon: choose this icon to show the notifications title/content.

icon: choose this icon to show the notifications title/content.

If you use the predefined apps, but want to disable some notifications, then create new notification group with disable notifications setting and add the apps.
Only if you have an incoming call
Double press to answer the call
Press the button to answer the call
Sound only if it is not muted or in DnD mode
Only if the headset is connected
Restart if it is in progress
You have to install Tasker first, after Mi Bandage
If you have a lower value, the music screen should be closed faster

The touch is valid when the display of Band changes (so it is advisable to rotate your wrist before touching).

It monitors elapsed time between touches, not the elapsed time to first touch.

Green icons on the cards indicates which another function can be similar to current pattern.

When you have an incoming call the phone does not recognise the following functions in order to ease touch input: location of the phone, repeat notifications, music control.

In test mode does not execute the function of recognised pattern.

Band vibration feedback just only, if there is a pattern taking into account the current status of the phone (call answering, rejecting only if there is an incoming call…).

Band vibrates once, when recognise a pattern.

Band vibrates twice, when not recognise any pattern after the longest pattern (if Not recognisable touch pattern signal is set).

Valid touching examples:
- touch
- touch and 1sec waiting, touch
- touch and 1sec waiting, touch and 1sec waiting, touch
- touch and 2sec waiting, touch
- touch and 2sec waiting, touch and 1sec waiting, touch
- touch and 2sec waiting, touch and 2sec waiting, touch

Power saving mode

It does not increase battery consumption.

Pulse measurement

On the bracelet, in the pulse measurement function, start the measurement (long touch) and then interrupt the measurement (one touch) after 1 second.

On the bracelet, start the pulse measurement function (Status) and then interrupt the measurement (swipe right) after 1 second.

On the bracelet, start the pulse measurement function (Status) and then interrupt the measurement (swipe right) after 1 second.

It must be turn off during continuous, online pulse measurement and exercise.

Find phone

On the bracelet, in the Find device function (More/Find device) start the finding (long touch).

On the bracelet, in the Find phone function (Settings/Find phone) start the finding.

 On the bracelet, in the Find phone function (Settings/Find phone) start the finding.

 Interrupt phone finding

On the bracelet, in the Find device function (More/Find device) interrupt the finding (one touch).

On the bracelet, in the Find phone function (Settings/Find phone) interrupt the finding (swipe right).

On the bracelet, in the Find phone function (Settings/Find phone) interrupt the finding (swipe right).

 Performance mode

Increases battery consumption. On the home screen turn on the touch only when you need it.

Touch

Touch is valid when the screen is off.

The button below the screen.

The button below the screen.

 Wrist lift

Wrist lift is valid when the screen turns on.

Call control

It always works, even if the touch monitor is switched off.


In test mode does not execute the function of recognised pattern.

Band vibration feedback just only, if there is a pattern taking into account the current status of the phone (call answering, rejecting only if there is an incoming call…).

Band vibrates once, when recognise a pattern.

Band vibrates twice, when not recognise any pattern after the longest pattern (if Not recognisable touch pattern signal is set).

Music screen mod

On the bracelet, open the music screen (swipe left or right), then close the screen.

Call control

It always works, even if the touch monitor is switched off.


In test mode does not execute the function of recognised pattern.

Band vibration feedback just only, if there is a pattern taking into account the current status of the phone (call answering, rejecting only if there is an incoming call…).

Band vibrates once, when recognise a pattern.

Band vibrates twice, when not recognise any pattern after the longest pattern (if Not recognisable touch pattern signal is set).

Mi 피트 운동을 시작할 때 자동으로 시작
더 정확한 데이터를 얻을 수 있도록 도움을 줍니다. (배터리 수명 감소)
%1$s 운동 수행을 감지하면 운동 중의 정확한 심박수 감지를 위해 자동으로 감지 빈도를 늘릴 것입니다.
경고 값에 도달하거나 10분 간 활동이 없을 경우, %1$s 진동할 것입니다
Online and offline pulse measurement can only be used in premium mode at the same time

Online pulse measurement

Bluetooth connection is required for monitoring the pulse.

Pulse monitor is repeated several times if the resulting value is invalid.

Offline pulse measurement

No Bluetooth connection required for pulse measurement.

Bluetooth connection is required for timed start and stop.

Manually launched measurements (Band, Mi Fit app) are also synchronized.
The phone is lost, please call the following numbers:

Band signal

When specified period of time expires, Band send signals if not connected to the phone.

App uses alarm function of Mi Fit to alert (overwrite 10. setting).

The alarm will be repeated several times if the Band do not detect any movement (because it uses the Band alarm).

App uses reminder function of Mi Fit to alert.

Before switching off Bluetooth or uninstalling the app you need to deactivate Band signal.

If you remove the application when the alarm is on, then you can disable it with turning on and off again Mi Fit 10. alarm setting.

 Phone signals

When specified period of time expires, phone send signals repeatedly if not connected to the bracelet.

This makes it easier to find the phone. If someone else finds the phone and it is locked he does not know who to notify, so you can display a message.

When bracelet is connected, alarm stops.

Must be enabled to display notification on the lock screen.
Lap time recording by one touch
Lap time displaying by one touch
Synchronize %1$s alarms (deleting and setting alarms on your smartwatch)

Turn off the alarm, timer and stopwatch before removing the application.

Signal when phone alarm sounds

Not all phones are supported. If your phone\'s built-in alarm clock does not work, download Google Clock from the Google Play.

Bell

Bluetooth connection is required for alarm, it alarms just only once for 10 seconds.

Alarm

Bluetooth connection is not required for alarm, app uses alarm function of Mi Fit to alert (overwrite 1. - 8. setting).
The alarm will be repeated several times if the Band do not detect any movement (because it uses the Band\'s alarm).
Minute accuracy, Band does not handle seconds at alarm.

Reminder signal and showing message require Bluetooth connection.
Synchronize %1$s reminders (deleting and setting reminders on your smartwatch)

<not_support_icon_text>Bluetooth connection is required to display the reminder.</not_support_icon_text> <support_icon_text>App uses reminder function of Mi Fit, so in Mi Fit you have to clear the reminders.</support_icon_text>
Save the downloaded watch face file to here
Move the downloaded watch face files from the %1$s directory

Mi 피트 애플리케이션에서 공장 시계 화면 중 하나를 설정하세요.
업로드할 때 같은 시계 화면을 선택해야 합니다.
(초기화는 한 번만 요구됩니다)

Download

Download watch faces from the web sites.

Move the files

If necessary, move the downloaded watch face files from the Download directory to the MiBandage directory.

Watch face change procedure:

Initialization

Resets the watch face\'s states to the original in the Mi Fit application, upload the first factory watch face.

Upload

Upload the selected watch face in the Mi Fit. It replaces the last uploaded factory watch face.


Upload multiple watch face

Launching Mi Fit without watch face replacing, upload the second factory watch face.

Upload the selected watch face in the Mi Fit.

Repeat these steps.


In the Mi Fit the watch face\'s picture will not change.
If someone tampered with the phone while you are away, you will know
Someone tampered with the phone, while you were gone
Wake up the phone screen monitoring

Events detected by the phone management agent:
- power on
- unlocking the screen
- motion detected

If someone operates with the phone while you are away, then events above are logged.

When you reconnect you will receive a notification in case of an event occurred.
The Android system force-stops a service only when memory is low. If after a while does not appear the notifications on the Band 2, you can prevent this.

Android 8 and above are required to show the icon on the notification bar. Swipe left or right on the notification bar to hide the icon. If the notification is hidden, switch off this setting for optimal performance.
After restoring, Bluetooth will be turning off and on and the application will restart.

- 유효성의 시작: 현재 시간 (start of validity: current time)
- 유효성의 종료: 유효성의 시작 + 최소 %1$,d일 (광고에 따라 더 많을 수 있습니다) (end of validity: start of validity + at least %1$,d days (depending on ad it can be more))
- 시간 조작은 유효성의 강제 종료를 야기할 수 있습니다 (time manipulation can cause termination of validity)

영상 재생 후에는 앱을 다시 시작해야 합니다.

- 광고 없음

- 방해 금지 모드

- 무제한 알림 모니터링

- text prefix, pre icon and filtering text can be used in notification monitoring

- repeat interval can be set freely in step monitoring function

- repeat interval can be set freely and show pulse can be used in pulse monitoring function

- repeat interval can be set freely and DnD mode can be used in lost monitoring function

- repeated reminders, show message and turn on bluetooth can be set freely in time monitoring

- …

- 저는 앱의 작동을 확인하였으며 그것은 적절히 작동하고 있습니다. (I have tested the app and it is working properly.)

- 저는 제가 버그, 소프트웨어의 변경으로 인한 소프트웨어 오류, 하드웨어 환경 또는 다른 애플리케이션 사용으로 인한 배상이나 환불을 요구할 수 없다는 것을 알고 있습니다. (I am aware of that I can not require compensation or refund due to bugs, software errors caused by changes in the software, hardware environment or using other applications.

- 모든 판매는 최종적이며 환불될 수 없습니다(Google 환불 정책 제외). (All sales are final and can not be refund (except Google refund policy).)

- 보장이 포함되어 있지 않습니다. (There is no warranty included.)


구매 후에는 앱을 다시 시작해야 합니다.
자동 이메일 처리, 응답을 받지 못할 수 있습니다

- We only collect anonymous information.

- We collect information at the application level about the services that you use and how you use them (Google Firebase Platform).

- We collect information at the application level like bugs, errors and crashes to provide improvements (Google Firebase Platform).

- Google Firebase Platform collects information anonymously. It reports trends without identifying individual users.

- We do not share any data with other companies and organizations.

- We do not collect personally identifiable information about you. In other words, we do not collect information such as your name, address, phone number, email address, IP address or MAC address.

- We do not collect personal health data, contacts and phone notification text.

폰에서 해킹 도구가 감지되었습니다.

해킹 도구가 설치되어있는 동안 프리미엄 모드를 사용할 수 없습니다.

저희는 애플리케이션 개발에 많은 시간을 할애하였으므로, 해킹 도구를 사용하지 말아주시기 바랍니다.
